author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: عزّة الکاینات وبابتلائي أشرقت شمس العدل علی العالمین بل حزني من الّذین یرتکبون الفحشآء وینسبون أنفسهم
translation: The shame I was made to bear hath uncovered the glory with which the whole of creation had been invested, and through the cruelties I have endured, the Daystar of Justice hath manifested itself, and shed its splendor upon men.
